message.ModJeevesInit: Jeeves thanks you for your patronage. Version {0}

ModJeevesTranslations.CloseDoorTooltip: Jeeves will close doors after the player moves through them.
ModJeevesTranslations.ManageGroundContainerTooltip: Jeeves will show items on the ground in front of the player as a container. Default Keybind: [ G ]
